description: FisheriesTripType captures the core features of a fishing trip.

tripId.description: Unique identifier of the trip specified as a scheme and id.

skipper.description: Name of the skipper of the vessel for the trip.

vesselName.description: The name of the vessel performing the trip.

vesselIdentifier.description: Unique identifier of the vessel specified as a scheme and id.

licences.description: The licence number(s) applicable to the trip.

startDateTime.description: The date and time of the start of the trip recorded in UTC format.

endDateTime.description: The date and time of the end of the trip recorded in UTC format.

fishery.description: The fishery in which the trip takes place.

manDays.description: The number of man days employed in the trip.

effortActive.description: The number of units of active effort.

effortNets.description: The number of units of nets effort.

environmentalObservations.description: Array of environmental observations recorded on the trip. May be an aggregation such as Mean or Maximum.
